# ImagePlaygroundStyle

**Structure**

Style options that determine the appearance of generated images.

## Declaration

```swift
struct ImagePlaygroundStyle
```

## Overview

When you create images programmatically, you can ask the system to create images in a particular style. The generative model takes the requested style option and applies it to the content it generates.

## Getting the style options

- **animation**: An option that yields animated images.
- **illustration**: An option that yields images in a 2D cartoon style.
- **sketch**: An option that yields images in the style of a hand-drawn sketch.
- **all**: An option that allows the creation of images in any style.

## Getting the style identifier

- **id**: A text-based description of the style option.

## Type Properties

- **externalProvider**: An option that yields images in a style provided by an external provider

## Platform support

- **ImagePlaygroundConcept**: Text elements that specify the content to include in the image.

## Conforms To

- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Identifiable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
